name: animate.css.js
description: Javascript(jQuery) helper for animate.css, let the animation in the JavaScript to use more simple.

scripts.build: npm run lint && uglifyjs src/animate.jquery.js -o dist/animate.jquery.min.js --source-map dist/animate.jquery.min.js.map --source-map-url animate.jquery.min.js.map --source-map-include-sources -p 1 -m -c

author: lzwme
